title: Generative AI-Enabled Mathematics Education Content Design Project

context.prior_knowledge: College-level foundational mathematics knowledge, basic digital tool proficiency, and understanding of educational content development
context.additional_context: Learners—mathematics majors or job-seeking individuals interested in math education—gain hands-on experience developing customized educational content using generative AI platforms (ChatGPT, DALL-E, MidJourney, etc.). Integrates theory and practice through parallel online and offline sessions

learning_goals: They can independently design multimedia content for explaining mathematical concepts and problem-solving using generative AI tools.
They can devise AI-driven personalized mathematics education strategies that account for learners' varying levels of technical proficiency.
Through project-based assessments, they can analyze the effectiveness of AI-integrated educational content and suggest improvements.

resources: Digital Authoring Tools (Canva, Adobe Express, etc.)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
